entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
